models.description: Qwen2.5 7B - Lightweight model with excellent multilingual capabilities, especially strong for Asian languages. Perfect for quick translations and UI text. No content filtering.
DeepSeek-R1 8B - Compact reasoning model with advanced context understanding for complex adult themes and character relationships. Excellent for RPG dialogue translation.
Qwen3 30B - Advanced model with 256K context window, superior Japaneseâ†’English translation, and excellent adult content handling. Perfect for complex RPG texts with long context requirements.
DeepSeek-R1 32B - Advanced reasoning model with superior context understanding for complex adult themes, character relationships, and RPG terminology consistency. No content filtering.
